Package com.crce.oopmlab

Class Circle

java.lang.Object
com.crce.oopmlab.Circle
public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
Class to create the circle object, methods to find perimeter, to find the changed radius, To translate, to find whether the point is present inside the circle or no and to find whether the circles are intersecting or no
